text:
(1) Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view northeastward across the mouth of the creek from the foot of Cornell Ave. In the center background is Screvin's Point, on the other side of which is Westchester Creek.

P. L. Sperr.
July 29, 1928.

(2) At the mouth of the Creek as viewed directly eastward from the same vantage point. In the background is Old Ferry Point on which is located the House of the Good Shepherd.

P. L. Sperr.
July 29, 1928.
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Cornell Avenue - [House of The Good Shepherd.]

text:
(1)
Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view south from the Lacombe Avenue bridge. In the center of the view are buildings of the Dawn Boat Corporation at the foot of Patterson Avenue.

July 29, 1928.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
A close view of the boat houses of the Dawn Boat Company.

P. L. Sperr

(3)
Looking down the creek and eastward across the marshes from the same vantage point.

July 29, 1928

P. L. Sperr
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Lacombe Avenue Bridge - [Dawn Boat Corporation - Westchester Motor Boat Club.]

text:
Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view northward from the foot of Patterson Ave., showing the bridge over which Lacombe Ave. traverses.

July 29, 1928.
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Patterson Avenue - [Lacombe Avenue Bridge.]

text:
(1) Pugsley's Creek, Bronx: A view eastward across the mouth of the creek, showing Screvin's Point (Castle Hill Park). The vantage point is the foot of Gildersleeve Ave.

P. L. Sperr. July 29, 1928.

(2) A view of the mouth of the creek at low tide.

P. L. Sperr. July 29, 1928.
title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Screvin's Point [Castle Hill Park.]

title: Pugsley Creek - Bronx - Screvin's Point [Castle Hill Park.]
